alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Harnett (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 5:23PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Harnett and northwestern Cumberland Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 523 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pope AFB to 9 miles west of Godwin. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lillington, Fort Liberty, Angier, Pope AFB, Spring Lake, Coats, Broadway, Linden, Raven Rock State Park and Olivia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
